name: DementiaWithComplications
title: Dementia with complications
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping of value sets identifies patients with dementia and mental degenerations with complications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to map to the QDM data type of diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a diagnosis of dementia or mental degenerations when complications are present.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes which represent a diagnosis of dementia without complications.)

concept.display: Dementia in other diseases classified elsewhere with behavioral disturbance

contains.display: Vascular dementia, unspecified severity, with behavioral disturbance
